name: Cryptstalker Wristguards
tooltip:
Cryptstalker WristguardsLevel 60

Huntsman Leopold at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Cryptstalker Wristguards if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Wristguards, 6 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar and 2 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Wristguards
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 6
- Arcanite Bar
- Cured Rugged Hide x 2
